summary: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.
cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger|Michael Biehn|Linda Hamilton|Paul Winfield|Lance Henriksen|Rick Rossovich|Bess Motta|Earl Boen|Dick Miller|Shawn Schepps|Bruce M. Kerner|Franco Columbu|Bill Paxton|Brad Rearden|Brian Thompson|William Wisher|Ken Fritz|Tom Oberhaus|Ed Dogans|Joe Farago|Hettie Lynne Hurtes|Tony Mirelez|Philip Gordon|Anthony Trujillo|Stan Yale|Al Kahn|Leslie Morris|Hugh Farrington|Harriet Medin|Loree Frazier|James Ralston|Norman Friedman|Barbara Powers|Wayne Stone|David Michels|John E. Bristol|Webster Williams|Patrick Pinney|Bill W. Richmond|Chino 'Fats' Williams|Greg Robbins|Marianne Muellerleile|John Durban|Marian Green|J. Randolph Harrison|David Kristin|Darrell Mapson|Bob Ritchie|John Stuart West
title: Terminator
